# HUD::GET_MENU_PED_BOOL_STAT

## Summary
Get the value of an boolean stat

## Parameters
* **STATSENUM** keyHash
* **BOOL\*** data

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p0 was always 0xAE2602A3.
